::Rodimus Prime::

Rodimus was blown back by the force of the exploding missile but was clear enough to avoid any real damage. Rodimus watched for another attack and was ready when Cyclonus released energy blasts from his hands, however he was now near the water and the sand was wet and weak. As Rodimus tried to push his legs to jump away one foot slipped and sunk deeper into the wet sand slowing him. The blasts strike Rodimus full force and send him back into the water. The fame designs on his chest were mostly scortched off and fracture points and tears were seen all over his armor. His yellow fenders on his back we badly dented. Luckily his joints and servos were all still in working order. Rodimus layed in the water. Was he hurt or playing possum?

Super Cyclonus <supercyclonus@...> wrote:                               
 --- Richard Allen <roborick007@...> wrote:
 
 > ::Rodimus Prime::
 > 
 > Rodimus is also blown backward and scortched. Just as he gets back up
 > he sees that Cyclonus had fired a missile of his own. Rodimus is
 > quick to react and fires at it with his wrist mounted lasers. The
 > rocket is still closer to Cyclonus then Rodimus.
 
 Cyclonus is nearly as swift as Rodimus, and as he watched the Autobot
 take a bead on the missile, he raised his hand as if to give a command
 but the missile errupted a brilliant burst of fire, smoke and debris as
 Rodimus' blast hits it. Cyclonus is lifted from his feet and flung head
 of heels back towards the water. Even as he did this the sweeps above
 fluttered and shifted, yet never moving from thier position, Cyclonus'
 word still holding them there. From his vantage point Scourge frowned
 as he folded his arms over his chest. 
 
 Cyclonus picked himself up and looked over at Rodimus, the Unicronian's
 armor is dented and the cracks that had confined themselves to his
 chest from his last attack were now spreading over his shoulders and
 hips. Despite the damage though Cyclonus' humorless smile reappeared.
 "Yes Rodimus, let that warrior out, it is he that I wish to vanquish in
 battle." Cyclonus raised both arms, his left arm rising a bit slower,
 obviously the victim of battle damage, he opened his palms as vicious
 power ripped out through the air at Rodimus Prime!
 
 Scourge's focus on the battle is distracted for a moment as he recived
 a communication. He said something softly into his radio, and then
 returned his focus to Cyclonus, a smug smile appearing on his
 faceplate.
 
 Preston
 (Da'minion)
